name: Cherry Creek
description: Cherry Creek is a tile-turning puzzle game, the aim is to rotate the river tiles to take water from the fountain to all the cherry trees. The puzzles are set in a picturesque natural environment, and offer something for all abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 500 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
